summary: Provides a representation of a single IPv6 address together with utilities to examine its characteristics and perform common IPv6‑specific conversions.
business_intent: Allows networking software to classify IPv6 addresses (global, link‑local, loopback, multicast, private, reserved, site‑local, unspecified) and to translate them to packed binary form or related IPv4 formats such as IPv4‑mapped, 6to4 and Teredo, supporting routing, security and interoperability features.
